entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Oak Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:22 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Blowing snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
